info.author: David Keeney, Erik Max Francis
info.description:
zoePG is a lightweight OpenGL graphics engine, written entirely in Python, and 
derived from zoe by Erik Max Francis. Its primary focus is rapid prototyping 
and experimentation, so it only supports the barest essentials, with focus on 
wire frames. Special emphasis is placed on particle systems.
info.name: zoePG
info.html_description: zoePG is a lightweight OpenGL graphics engine, written entirely in Python, and derived from zoe by Erik Max Francis. Its primary focus is rapid prototyping and experimentation, so it only supports the barest essentials, with focus on wire frames. Special emphasis is placed on particle systems.
